price: Et gardez dans vos mémoires ce qui, dans vos foyers, est récité des versets d’Allah et de la sagesse. Allah est Doux et Parfaitement Informé.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡنَ مَا يُتۡلَىٰ فِي بُيُوتِكُنَّ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ لَطِيفًا خَبِيرًا

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur'na mā yut'lā fī buyūtikunna min āyāti al-lahi wal-ḥik'mati inna al-laha kāna laṭīfan khabīran
